sentence: News The flood of controversies surrounding Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) shows no sign of ceasing just weeks before his May 17 primary, raising questions as to whether he can avoid a runoff despite being one of the highest-profile freshmen in the House.
author: Tal Axelrod
title: Mounting scandals fuel uncertainty over Cawthorn's reelection
